title: Pirate Ship Escape Room
body: This exciting Pirate escape game calls for those hardy individuals looking for adventure. If you and your mate(s) are among them, this Pirate - themed challenge is waiting for you! Your team’s senses and abilities will be tested in many aspects. Get on board and have one hour of fun in this authentic atmosphere of Pirate Ship Escape Room, where your magical journey is flavored with adrenaline-raising special effects, maps, puzzles & skeleton keys. The game starts with your party being captured and you have been locked up on Captain Jack’s Pirate Ship. The captain and crew will be gone for one hour. This will be your one and only chance to escape. The clock is ticking, are you up to the challenge?
